name: Blue Rover (Max)
description:
Hey, This is the fist game I ever made with unity. It was heavily inspired by "Potatoman Seeks the Troof". This game is still in beta, so here are some updates I'm working on:

-Voice lines

-Better F*cking Sounds

-More Maps

-Dialogue

*Hey! future me here. This game was removed for a little while, but now it's back up!
